entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
